I've seen that requested before, so people would use it. Bonus points if it can predict stresses while still in the editor!

Some other potential functions:

  • Fuel tank dead-weight (current mass divided by full mass, useful for asparagus designs)
  • Per-stage thrust-to-weight ratio colouring
  • Post-mission summary issue highlighting (which of the connections broke and in what order?)
  • Resource production/consumption (e.g. solar panels green, lights orange, ion engines red)
  • A hard mode for probes: Force Vessel View, map view and any externally mounted cameras as the only views available when launching probes for a mission control-style system.

Now that you have a framework, there are loads of possibilities. Have fun with them!

Loving the plugin so far. One thing to concider for future versions perhaps would be an option to not render changes(bending etc.) And locking the view to 2d rendering. Perhaps a seperate view that updates more often and is completly 2d(just for viewing staging and heat etc.) But its no biggie. The view works really well as it is now. And the framerate load is barely noticable.
